attributes.action: abolish cat flaps in living room windows (like my neighbours)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My neighbours have a cat flap in their living room window that looks rubbish, it's not even mounted square, I'd say it's a half inch off from one side to the other at least, shoddy.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
